result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

**BOND IS A BIFURCATED BOND OF $4,700.00 SIGNATURE AND $300.00 CASH.  CASH TO BE POSTED PRIOR TO RELEASE.**  Defendant shall not possess or consume alcohol, controlled substances, or Prescriptions without a valid prescription
 for self.

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 10:02 AM Defendant Brett Alan Mcgaffigan in court, in custody.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video means for Defendant Brett Alan Mcgaffigan. Court calls case, cites appearances.  Motion to modify bond filed.  Atty Brewer waives reading of complaint.  Has exp. charges/penalties.  Reserves all juris. challenges.  Bond is $5,000 cash bond at this time.  DA has reviewed motion.  Probation hold lifted.  DA waives notice so can deal with today.  Requests Court to keep bond as previously set.  Atty Brewer addresses Court.  Def can post $350.  Court questions Atty Brewer.  Court questions def if can post $500.  Atty Brewer asks for bond to be $400.  Court sets bond at $300 cash.  Any prior conditions continue.  Court sets bifurcated bond of $5,000 with $300 cash component.  Per Atty Brewer, def waives time limits.  PTC to be set for 3/24 at 1:00 p.m.  Def to call Atty Brewer when released.  Adj.  10:11 a.m.  klr  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 24, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Notice of Motion and Motion for Modification of Bond

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: 01/28/22 PCS/JD/Bond hearing minutes:  9:39 a.m.  Court calls case.  Def appears via Zoom from ICJ.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  Court explains right to atty.  Def to be provided public def info.  Court explains PC hearing.  DA requests PC statement be used.  Court swears in Chief Colassaco.  Direct by Court.  Court reads PC statement for def.  Def is also on a probation hold.  Court finds PC to proceeed.  Def understands.  DA requests $5,000 cash bond.  Court addresses def.  Def responds.  Court sets as requested.  $5,000 cash bond with conditions of no possession or consumption of alcohol, controlled substances or prescriptions without a valid prescription for self.  Adj.  9:47 a.m.  klr
